column4: my desktop is locked!! cant right click, cant create shortcuts. the shortcuts that where there before are not showing! help
my desktop is locked!! cant right click, cant create shortcuts. the shortcuts that where there before are not showing! help
do you have something you were working on you wish to save? If not just hit Ctrl-Alt-Del and choose log out and then you can log back in, it should bring everything back
if that is not doing anything the system may be completely frozen and just needs to be rebooted
